Instruction: Cut the pumpkin into small cubes and place them on a baking sheet.
Drizzle olive oil over the pumpkin cubes and season with salt and black pepper.
Roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until the pumpkin is tender and slightly caramelized.
In a large bowl, combine baby spinach, thinly sliced red onion, crumbled feta cheese, and walnuts.
Add the roasted pumpkin cubes to the salad.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil and balsamic vinegar to make the dressing.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.
Serve as a nutritious and flavorful side dish.
